I have seen many guys trying to â€œdowngradeâ€ some Toshiba machines from original VISTA to XP but they donÂ´t have support for that O.S.  I did the effort of try that task and all drivers I could download were installed and tested in my TOSHIBA SATELLITE U405-S2856 but the drivers work in a shitload of different machines too (take a look some lines down). After testing them I created a backup file with â€œDriver Magician v3.5â€³ so if you need them you need only to point your windows to each individual folder.

Supported machines:
